Articles.Content:
Hi,

I can't upload a forum avatar and I don't know how to edit my signature. Would be awesome if anyone could tell me.

New users (affectionately called Curious George) can't edit avatar or signature. Wait until after you have 3 approved posts under your belt, you will no more belong to that usergroup and will have some freedom to choose avatar and signature. And, please, do choose respecting the forum rules.

Think it was changed back to 5 posts a while back, actually... In any case, after you've made a few posts these options will become available to you.

They're only disabled for new users in order to mitigate any potential damage spambots can do.
Ahh ok thank you very much. Didn't know that option from other forums, but sounds usefull ;-)
